sense.def:
Kar je
all right
je zadovoljivo ali sprejemljivo.

seg.quote: "Do you like this champagne?"—"It's all right."

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
all right
je zdrav, nepoškodovan ali na varnem.

seg.quote: Someone should see if she's all right.

sense.def:
Izraz
"all right"
uporabimo, kadar v nekaj privolimo.

seg.quote: "Can you help?"—"All right. What do you want me to do?"

sense.def:
All right?
rečemo človeku, kadar želimo preveriti, ali je razumel tisto, kar smo pravkar povedali.

seg.quote: If you feel dizzy again put your head in your hands, all right?
